subject: ADED
name: Survey: HRD & AdEd
fullname: Survey: Human Resource Development and Adult Education
info: Overview of fields of human resource development and adult education.  Includes societal context, systems theory, processes, definitions, philosophies, goals, sponsoring agencies, professional roles, participants, and resources. Emphasis on the unique characteristics and ways the fields overlap and enhance one another.

subject: ADED
name: Volunteers
fullname: Working with Volunteers in Community Settings
info: Uses collaborative, experiential methods to address fundamental issues and practices in volunteer development. Explore personal philosophies, staffing, and key issues and trends in the administration of volunteer programs.

subject: ADED
name: Distance Lrng in AdEd & Trng
fullname: Distance Learning in Adult Education and Training
info: Distance learning concepts, theory, history, present practice, delivery systems, course design, major issues, and future directions.

subject: ADED
name: Mgng/Consult/HRD/AE
fullname: Managing and Consulting in Human Resource Development and Adult Education
info: Theory of managing/consulting in human resource development and adult education. Assessment of role requirements. Experimentation with practical management/consultation processes/techniques.

subject: ADED
name: Adv Theory HRD/AE
fullname: Advanced Theory in Human Resource Development and Adult Education
info: Theoretical understanding of individuals and organizations as adaptive entities; roles of human resource development and adult education in mediating complex demands.
